content: each side on the front and back the body was subsequently knitted in this manner setup row *k18 ppatternm k to 18 sts bef m ppatternm k18 sm p1* sm repeat from * to * the body was subsequently knitted in this manner row 1 *work row 1 of overlapping leaves spatternm k to patternm spatternm work row 1 of overlapping setup row *k1 ppatternm k to 1 st bef m ppatternm leaves sm p1* sm repeat from * to * k1 sm p1* sm repeat from * to * pattern was repeated till the body is 20cm from the the repeating pattern of the chart was worked in underarm body was finished with 5 row of garter between the pattern markers stitch and bobble in pattern - pattern repeated 3 times vertically neckline and sleeve hems finished with garter stitch - 14 row of stockinette and bobble in pattern - pattern repeated 3 times vertically - 21 row of stockinette body was finished with 5 row of 2x2 rib and bobble in pattern neckline and sleeve hems finished with 2x2 rib and bobble in pattern 15 pattern bind off for option 1 fully stockinette bobble body sts knitwise and fasten_off alternatively explore different bind off techniques for your desired end result some alternative bind off techniques to consider in place of a regular bobble - i-cord bobble yt tutorial - picot bobble yt tutorial - bobble in pattern more applicable to ribbing or lace patterns neckline similarly the neckline can be finished in a multitude of ways here are some ideas finishing - crochet on the rs insert hook into the right when worn back and single_crochet around the neckline make a sc3tog at the center of the v-neck close the round with a slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends or repeat another round of sts finishing - knit on the rs starting from the right when worn back - pick up 1 per back st - 40 42 46 48 50 54 58 58 60 sts - pick up 1 per sleeve st - 13 13 13 17 17 19 21 21 21 sts - pm pick up 3 sts every 4 row down the neckline - 40 44 44 48 48 52 52 52 52 sts - pm pick up 1 at the center of the v-neck pm - pick up 3 sts every 4 row up the neckline - 40 44 44 48 48 52 52 52 52 sts - pm pick up 1 per sleeve st - 13 13 13 17 17 19 21 21 21 sts join in the round for a combined total of 143 153 161 179 181 193 201 205 207 sts knit a few row in your desired st pattern while decreasing at the 4 points on the neckline indicated with bobble and weave in the ends here are 3 ideas on how to finish the neckline garter st round 1 *p to 2 sts bef m p2tog sm* repeat
